schema.description:
需要接入全站加速IPA的域名。

支持泛域名，以英文句号（.）开头，例如：.example.com。
资源组ID。不传该参数时，系统自动补全默认资源组ID。

加速区域。取值：

- **domestic**：仅中国内地。

- **overseas**：全球（不包含中国内地）。

- **global**：全球。

协议名称。取值：

- **udp**：UDP协议。
- **tcp**：TCP协议。


> 例如：`{"protocol":"udp"}`。

400.errorMessage: The specified DomainName is invalid.
The specified Source Content is invalid.
The Source Content must be specified.
The Source Type must be specified.
The specified Source Type is invalid.
The specified Source Priority is invalid.
The specified Scope is invalid.
The maximum number of back-to-origin IP addresses is exceeded.
The specified certificate format is invalid.
The maximum length of the certificate is exceeded.
Error checking the security. Provide the valid origin site information.
A wildcard domain name and a domain name with an all. prefix cannot be both specified.
Wildcard domain names are not supported.
The wildcard domain name overlaps a domain name at the same level.
The specified ResourceGroupId is invalid.
The root domain of your domain is reserved by another account. Submit a ticket to contact customer support.
The alicdn.com domain supports a maximum of three levels of domain.
The specified TopLevelDomain does not exist.
The resource group does not exist.
The resource group does not exist.
The current status of the resource group does not support this operation.
Real-name registration is required for services offered in Mainland China.
The source port is empty, or it is outside the range 0-65535.
The ICP filing interface is unavailable. Please try again later.
The domain is on the ICP blacklist.
The domain is on the ISP blacklist.
The specified TopLevelDomain does not match webSiteType.
The maximum number of domains is exceeded.

403.errorMessage: The DCDN IPA service has not been activated.

404.errorMessage: The required port has no resources, please submit a ticket.

title: 添加IPA层应用加速域名
summary: 调用AddDcdnIpaDomain添加IPA层应用加速域名，一次只能提交一个加速域名。
description:
> 
> - 创建加速域名之前，必须先开通全站加速的IPA服务。
> - 加速域名必须已经备案成功。
> - 如果源站内容不在阿里云平台上，则需要审核，审核工作会在下一工作日前完成。
> - 单用户调用频率：10次/秒。
requestParamsDescription:
Sources各字段含义

 | 参数   | 类型  | 是否必选 | 描述                                                            |
| -------- | ------- | ----- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| type     | String  | 是   | 源站类型。ipaddr：IP源站；domain：域名源站；oss：不支持oss。 |
| content  | String  | 是   | 回源地址，可以是IP或域名。                            |
| port     | Integer | 是   | 自定义端口，范围：0~65535。                           |
| priority | String  | 否   | 源站地址对应的优先级，支持20和30，默认20。20是主源，30是备源。                      |
| weight   | String  | 否   | 回源权重，100以内，默认10。                                        |
